Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please don't be rough with that. I'm going
to use that board in the barn's roof.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry! I'm a bit busy with...


work...<sp:5:0:0>right...<sp:5:0:0>now...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Link!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wow, what a RELIEF. I was seriously
worried about you. Where have you
BEEN, anyway?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Uh...<sp:5:0:0>sorry for the excitement. I'm just
happy you're back.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I've been sorting out whether or not I can
build a <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> in Lookout Landing.

Lester has come here to <clr:0000>care for the
horses<clr:ffff>. So it'd help him out a lot if he
had a proper stable.
The project would likely take me a while
to complete.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>But once it's done, you'll be able to take
full advantage, Link!
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So they need someone to rebuild their
bridge, huh? Easy enough, right?<sp:5:2:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Nope.<sp:0:4:0>I have to build a roof over the well. And
then there's the mini stable.

I have to finish all of that before I can
do anything else.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's still gonna be a while before I can
complete the <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>.

Things need to be just so for Lester,
who's here to <clr:0000>take care of the horses<clr:ffff>.

So if the design isn't perfect, I'll get an
earful from him.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By the way, have you been inside the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff> yet?

They have beds you can sleep in for free.
It's a great place to get some rest.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey, Link. Guess I'm not surprised to see
you zoomin' around even on a rainy day.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Ah, Link! Great job out there!


Are you using the <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>?


You made building that roof look like a
breeze! I was struggling with it, but you?
You just pulled it off in no time.
It's real inspiring. I should get to work
improving my carpentry too.
near_06: I think I'll take a little break.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You shopping?


I hear that the shop owner Mubs wants
to expand her offerings.

I was considering adding some more
shelves for her.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ruins plopped down outta the sky, and
now things are like this.

But what's most important is that nobody
got hurt.

Thankfully, we built Lookout Landing to
last, and it lasted even through all of this!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>If the ruins were to start falling apart,
somebody really could get hurt though,
so I'd like to start mopping this all up.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I think they're important to the
survey team...

In which case, I'll ask them first what
they'd like to have happen.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>So?! What do you think of the ol' handy-
dandy Skyview Tower, eh?

The Skyview Towers are a result of the
sweat and toil from those of us at
<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>.
Purah charted out the design work,
naturally, but the project was huge in
scale and sent us all over the world!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm taking a rest right here. But I'll be
up and at 'em the moment something
comes up.
You should rest, too, Link. You can settle
into a <clr:0000>bed<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You shopping?


This shop has the best goods in all of
Hyrule. I'm serious.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Even I feel a sense of pride about it,
and I don't even work here!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sorry, but I've got my hands full
right now.

If it's <clr:0000>building materials <clr:ffff>you're after, I
suggest you start by cutting a tree down.
After that...<sp:1:0:4:28000000> Hey, hold on.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm just checkin' around to see if anyone
needs a good old-fashioned carpenter to
help them out.
Right now, seems like nobody's in need of
my skills, but I'll be ready regardless.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sorry, but right now I'm busy sorting out
remodeling plans for Lookout Landing.

If it's <clr:0000>building materials <clr:ffff>you're after, I
suggest you start by cutting a tree down.
After that...<sp:1:0:4:28000000> Hey, hold on.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Mubs used to run a general store back
in her home village.

So she's got a lot of tight connections in
the trade. She stocks goods from all kinds
of regions.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Pretty stellar craftsmanship, am I right?


Gotta say, I've outdone myself this time!


If you end up boarding your horses here,
they'll have a luxurious time.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If the ruins were to start falling apart,
somebody really could get hurt though,
so I'd like to start mopping this all up.
But I think they're important to the
survey team, so I'd better leave
them be.
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Thankfully, we built Lookout Landing to
last, and it lasted even through all of this!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've outdone myself with this stable, if I
do say so myself.

Please feel free to use it whenever you
like, Link!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The Skyview Towers are the culmination
of everyone's skills at
<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>.
Use them with peace of mind,
knowing that.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I thought that might be you, Link!


Wow, what a relief. You're safe. I was
seriously worried about you. Where have
you BEEN, anyway?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Uh, <sp:5:0:0>sorry.<sp:5:0:0> Just relieved you're back.<sp:5:0:0> So,
you know <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>'s here, right? You gotta
see her right away if you haven't yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But wow, I can't even tell you how happy I
am to see you here at Lookout Landing.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Being poised for construction at the drop
of a hat is what being a pro is all about.

I'll be ready whenever things
need constructin'.

Anyway, you should rest up, Link. You can
settle into a <clr:0000>bed<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Purah always keeps it together, but I'm
betting if she sees you, she'll probably
lose her cool.
Everyone's been worried since you and
the princess disappeared. But Purah...<sp:5:1:0>
she's been REALLY worried.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yep! Originally it was just a humble shop
in a small village called <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> in
<clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>.
But the boss, <clr:0000>Hudson<clr:ffff>, is just brilliant
when it comes to constructing things.

Princess Zelda caught wind of his
brilliance, and before you knew it, he was
entrusted with restoring all of Hyrule!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I heard that lately he's been <clr:0000>making
dream homes<clr:ffff> for folks, though I couldn't
tell ya much more about it.
If you're curious, then next time you're
out in Akkala, I recommend dropping
by <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>.
Talk_37:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Who knew we'd end up building things that
catapult people into the wild blue yonder...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Enokida: Boss! Thanks for all ya do!
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Did you hear?


Is it really Princess Zelda like
everyone's saying?

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Man, if only I'd built some sort of
contraption that could get ya to a
floating castle...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I hate to say it...


But I've still gotta finish up with the
stable. I'd love to help ya though...
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Man, if only I'd built some sort of
contraption that could get ya to a
floating castle...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Gotta wonder though. If that really was
the princess, what's she doing up
there, anyway?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The well is still under construction, so
please steer clear for now.

If you fell in, it'd be a whole thing.
Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Are you that interested in the well?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>HEY! What if that had turned into a
bigger problem?!

I don't care what your reasons areâ€”that
was uncalled for.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm hurrying, so just hang tight on it a bit
longer, K?
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Link! If you thought that was funny,
it wasn't.

Leave it alone, OK?!
